transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, Namaste, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji, Pawan bhai, Avnish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Kaise ho?
Customer: Bas badhiya. Bolo.
Executive: Main bhi badhiya, sir. Aur kaisa chal raha hai business vagaira apna?
Customer: Bas abhi just start hua hai. Abhi to kaisa hoga? Dheere dheere ho raha hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. Are, main ye puch raha tha, actually apni jo product line hai na, us product line mein kuch products aate hain jaise flat light fixture ho gaya, theek hai? Ek aapka sports lighting ho gaya, theek hai? Fir aapka solar street lights hai, fir solar LED street light ho gaya, LED panel light hai, solar lighting hai, LED cob light hai, tennis court lighting jo hoti hai wo, theek hai? Waterproof LED light ho gayi, LED focus light aur aapka halogen flood light ek aati hai, ek LED square panel aata hai. Ye sab apne paas mein available rehta hai kya? Matlab hum log ye agar kisi client ko chahiye to hum log sale karte hain kya, sir?
Customer: Halogen matlab wo LED flood ko hi halogen bolte hain. But kabhi kya hota hai, kuch language mein kya hota hai jaise ek words category words hoti hai na, wo log search karte hain to flood light kisi ko idea nahi rehta hai. Sab log aise hi dhundte hain halogen. Halogen matlab flood hi hota hai actually.
Executive: Achcha. Aur matlab agar koi halogen ke naam se bhi search karega to bhi aap de hi sakte ho na? Apne paas to product available hi hai na?
Customer: Haan, de sakte hain.
Executive: Hmm, main wahi puch raha tha ki matlab.
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo de sakte hain. Ye wale jo products aise hain na, ye IndiaMART aapko suggestion mein de rahi thi ki bhai aapki jo product line hai usme ispe bhi hamare paas mein searches aati hain. To agar aap kaam karte ho to aap isko add kar sakte ho, koi problem nahi hai isme.
Customer: Haan, wo kar sakte hain. But abhi humne kya kiya jaise bahut wo changes nahi kar raha tha uske andar. Kyunki wo yahan pe local apne jaise Gujarat mein hai to wo log samajhte hain halogen. Baki Gujarat ke bahar apan wo dekhne jaye to wo flood light hi bolte hain wahan pe. Kuch kuch jagahon pe hai ki halogen ke naam se wo pata rehta hai. Lekin ab difference aisa hota hai jyadatar halogen aadmi samajhta hai ki jo wo kisi program vagaira mein wo lagaya jata hai bade wale to unka main us cheez ko wo halogen direct bolte hain unko ye nahi pata hota hai ki halogen ko hi flood light bol rahe hain basically. Hota kya hai ki ye wala difference aa jata hai.
Executive: Haan, wahi difference wahi aa jayega.
Executive: Hmm. To isme hum aisa kar sakte hain basically ki ya to iske naam se ek product bana kar ke dal le, theek hai? Taki hamara product dikhne lage.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Otherwise jo aapki aap jaise ye hai 60 watt LED street light, theek hai?
Executive: Ye wali jo hai isme aapki add kar deta hu ki ye wali category bhi aapki add kar deta hu. Hai na? To wo jyada aapke liye better rahega taki usme bhi agar searches aa rahi hai to kam se kam at least hamare paas mein hamari company visible honi chahiye ki yaar hamari company dikh jaye wahan pe.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ji. Hai na? Ye cheez main kar deta hu.
Executive: Haan, wo wo theek hai. But wo jo panel lights vagaira wo sab mein kya hota hai ki wo apna trading jaisa hai. Hum kya hai abhi khud nahi bana rahe wo cheez. Panel lights.
Customer: Nahi to panel lights nahi na.
Customer: Haan, panel light mat rakhna kyuki wo apne deal hi nahi kar rahe. Jyada se jyada isme jo mujhe lag raha hai ek aapka halogen wala aa jayega, ek aapka LED focus light chal jayega aapke liye. Ek aapka LED light fixture chal jayega. Ek aapka sports lighting agar aapko chahiye to aap kar sakte ho, theek hai?
Customer: Sports lighting matlab yahi hota hai high masking jaise wo bolte hain na halogen flood lights vagaira jaise stadium lights pe lagti hai.
Executive: Hmm. Wahi usko.
Customer: Street lagaunga nahi kyuki street already aapke mein padi hai. LED street bhi aapke mein padi hai to usko koi rakhne ka koi matlab hai nahi ki already pehle se hi hai. Cob light chahiye? Cob light dalna hai?
Customer: Fog light matlab wahi hota hai halogen ka hi hota hai to fog light mat rakhna kyuki bahut rare requirement aati hai.
Executive: Fog nahi, frog nahi sir, cob.
Customer: Cob. Nahi nahi nahi, wo mat karna.
Executive: Achcha, wo na karo.
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo mat karna.
Executive: Achcha achcha, theek hai, koi dikkat nahi. Ye wala main add kar de raha hu. Aur aapka kuch baat hua tha kya?
Customer: Baat hui thi do din pehle hi baat hui thi meri unse to bol rahe ke nahi main baat kar leta hu unse kyuki kuch wo bahar gaye hue the na. Meri call pe hi baat hui thi actually.
Executive: Are meri aaj baat hui thi abhi morning mein hi. Matlab aapke call se pehle unhi ki call aayi thi. To unse uske liye pucha to bole ki haan yaar dekh leta hu usko. Usko dekh usko dekh ke usko bhi confirm kar lete hain. To maine isse product vagaira ka pucha to fir bole ki yaar wo aap Pawan se hi baat kar lo. To maine kaha theek hai. Maine uske liye main puch raha ki matlab wo preferred wale ke liye bhi discuss hua tha kya apna?
Customer: Preferred wala?
Executive: Preferred wala jo maine unlimited city wala aapko bataya tha.
Customer: Haan haan, maine wo bola tha but abhi wo nahi karna hai kyuki abhi kya hai ki isme bhi achi rehti hai visibility aisa nahi hai ki changes karna hai. Isme bhi rehti hai, theek hai filhal. Aur abhi wo aisa aapko bolenge shayad aapse baat karenge mujhse bolenge ki main ek bar baat kar le raha hu Pawan se bhi kuch aur requirement hai kya hai to main uske baad mein fir final karke usko process karwate hain.
Customer: Haan wahi.
Customer: Fir maine bola tha ki wo add on karna hai to wo to baad mein bhi kar sakte hain usme koi itna hai nahi issue, theek hai. Lekin abhi karoge to aapke liye better rahega, theek hai. Wo isliye better rahega kyuki abhi jaise hai to apna renewal hai, theek hai. Renewal ke sath mein na deal achi mil jayegi aapko price vagaira mein achcha option mil jayega. Yahi cheez hum baad mein karenge to hamare liye costly pad jayegi kyuki us samay renewal nahi hoga to main ye bhi nahi dikha paunga ki nahi renewal hai to sir le rahe hain uske sath add kar rahe hain. To wo fir actual jo rate hota hai usi rate pe hi jayega aur waise bhi matlab jo hai ab to khair offer to koi aana nahi hai kyuki jitna bhi offer aata hai wo last offer jo hai Deepawali ke Deepawali mein hi aata hai. Uske baad mein fir jo hai to koi bhi offer company waise bhi nahi nikalti hai kyuki unko bhi pata hai ki December, January, February, March client jo hai apne aap investment karta hai kyuki unko tax mein rebate milta hai. To wo uski wajah se us samay karte hain to us samay koi bhi offer nahi nikalta hai. Hai na? To abhi karna hai ek bar to ek bar dekh lete hain usko kuch achi deal de dunga usme koi dikkat nahi rahegi. Achcha price vagaira. Aur baki wo wala product aap bol rahe the samajhne ke liye to agar possible ho video meeting ke liye to bataye ek bari matlab samjha deta hu unse bhi ek bar puch lo agar wo aa jaye to jyada better hai ek hi bar mein ho jayega. Wo hai nahi available agar dekho wo aa jata hai to fir kar lenge apan meeting. Theek hai? Ek bar aap otherwise fir kal rakhna. Ha theek hai. Main wahi aapko call kar lunga agar wo aa raha hai to fir apan meeting kar lenge. Otherwise apne ko kal dekh lenge chalo na wo video meeting mein aise karke ek bar unko bhi dikha dete hain na to wo achcha rahega.
Customer: Ha ha wahi main tabhi main bol raha hu.
Customer: Ha. Kyuki hai ki ek bar main to theek hai main to main khud hi dekh raha hu is cheez ko main samajh raha hu wo cheeze par unko bhi idea hona chahiye.
Executive: Wahi cheez main bol raha hu isliye maine bola. Theek hai aap ek bar baat karke mere ko batana fir ha.
Customer: Haan, definitely, definitely. Hai na? Aap dekh lo baki jo fir main baat karke unse aapko update kar laao.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about product availability.

- Customer inquired about preferred plan discussion.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed halogen products are available.

- Executive offered to add new product categories.

- Executive explained renewal benefits for better deals.

- Executive suggested a video meeting for product explanation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will wait for customer's call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product, halogen, led, renewal, meeting
